sn1.31:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
sn1.31:1.3: Then, late at night, several glorious deities of the Satullapa Group, lighting up the entire Jeta’s Grove, went up to the Buddha, bowed, and stood to one side.
sn1.31:1.4: Standing to one side, one deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.31:2.2: Try to get close to the virtuous!
sn1.31:2.3: Understanding the true teaching of the good,
sn1.31:3.1: Then another deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.31:4.2: Try to get close to the virtuous!
sn1.31:4.3: Understanding the true teaching of the good,
sn1.31:4.4: wisdom is gained—but not from anyone else.”
sn1.31:5.1: Then another deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.31:6.2: Try to get close to the virtuous!
sn1.31:6.3: Understanding the true teaching of the good,
sn1.31:6.4: you grieve not among the grieving.”
sn1.31:7.1: Then another deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.31:8.2: Try to get close to the virtuous!
sn1.31:8.3: Understanding the true teaching of the good,
sn1.31:9.1: Then another deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.31:10.2: Try to get close to the virtuous!
sn1.31:10.3: Understanding the true teaching of the good,
sn1.31:10.4: sentient beings go to a good place.”
sn1.31:11.1: Then another deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.31:12.2: Try to get close to the virtuous!
sn1.31:12.3: Understanding the true teaching of the good,
sn1.31:13.1: Then another deity said to the Buddha,
sn1.31:14.1: “You’ve all spoken well in your own way. However, listen to me also:
sn1.31:15.2: Try to get close to the virtuous!
sn1.31:15.3: Understanding the true teaching of the good,
sn1.31:16.1: That is what the Buddha said.
sn1.31:16.2: Then those deities, knowing that the teacher approved, bowed and respectfully circled the Buddha, keeping him on their right, before vanishing right there.
